column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////I'd come back here again but would make sure to have waitress read back our order just to be on the SAME page
column2: would give it 3 stars tbh because waitress messed up our order(we were supposed to get two small dishes but instead she thought we said half of one personal dish and half of another
column3: which doesnt make sense at all but idk man)
column4: but if we added another small dish it would have taken another hour to get our pizza. And that's not happening.
